statements: SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_date, satisfaction_rating FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating >= 4;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_date FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating <= 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 1001 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating ASC
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_rating) AS avg_rating FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM patient_feedback GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_feedbacks > 2
SELECT feedback_text FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM QualityImprovements WHERE improvement_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM PatientFeedback GROUP BY feedback_id;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 2;
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_rating) AS average_rating FROM PatientFeedback;
SELECT * FROM QualityImprovements WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 50
SELECT name, age FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, address FROM Patient WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT * FROM SatisfactionSurvey WHERE satisfaction_score >= 4
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age, address FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name, gender, address FROM Patient WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT survey_id, patient_id, satisfaction_score, survey_date FROM SatisfactionSurvey WHERE satisfaction_score >= 4 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient p JOIN SatisfactionSurvey s ON p.patient_id = s.patient_id WHERE p.age >= 40 AND s.satisfaction_score >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_address FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM Surveys WHERE survey_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, survey_score FROM Surveys JOIN Patients ON Surveys.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM CareProviders;
SELECT department_name, hospital_id FROM Department ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM CareProviders JOIN Hospital ON CareProviders.hospital_id = Hospital.hospital_id;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM CareProviders JOIN Hospital ON CareProviders.hospital_id = Hospital.hospital_id WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM PatientFeedback WHERE satisfaction_rating = 5;
SELECT department_name, hospital_name, provider_name FROM Department d JOIN Hospital h ON d.hospital_id = h.hospital_id JOIN CareProviders cp ON d.provider_id = cp.provider_id;
SELECT survey_date, recommend_to_other_patient FROM PatientSurvey WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text FROM PatientFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
